title: Once upon a time
author: Evelyn Moore
description: A magical story about courage, friendship, and the journey of self-discovery in a forgotten kingdom. When a girl named Elara finds an enchanted book in an old library, she is transported to a world where fairy tales come alive and every choice leads her closer to truth or darkness. A captivating novel filled with symbolism, emotion, and adventure, reminding us that within each of us lies a hero waiting to awaken.

title: The Cellar
author: Natasha Preston
description: Sixteen‑year‑old Summer is kidnapped by a mysterious man who calls himself Clover and held captive in a meticulously kept underground cellar alongside three other girls—Rose, Poppy, and Violet—whom he refers to as his “flowers.” Told through alternating perspectives (Summer, her boyfriend Lewis, and even Clover himself), this gripping YA psychological thriller explores survival, trauma, and the desperate drive to reclaim one’s identity in the face of darkness.

title: Revenant
author: Taylor Lee
description: In 'Revenant', a quiet life is shattered when secrets from the past resurface, threatening everything the main character holds dear.

title: The Unknown Family
author: Emily Miller
description: 'The Unknown Family' is a journey through heartbreak, self-discovery, and the strength it takes to start over when the world falls apart.
